Package edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.views

This package sets up the RationaleExplorer and handles operations within it.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IDeltaListener Taken from sample code for the Eclipse Corner article on tree viewers
IRationaleUpdateEventListener The interface for a rationale update event.
 

Class Summary
CandidateLabelProvider Provides the .gif files that are used to draw the images on the candidate rationale tree.
CandidateRationaleContentProvider This provides the content for the RationaleExplorer tree view.
CandidateRationaleExplorer The Candidate Rationale Explorer is used as temporary storage for rationale elements extracted from documents that haven't yet been imported into the SEURAT rationale-base.
CandidateTreeParent This uses the TreeObjects that describe each node in the tree to form the tree of candidate rationale.
DeltaEvent Taken from sample code for the Eclipse Corner article on tree viewers
GraphicalRationale This class was intended to handle the graphical rationale drawing task in a pleasant Eclipse editor tab.
GraphicalRationale.Input  
GraphicalRationalePop Draws the rationale tree graphically on a popup shell.
IOntology  
ITreeViewerSetup  
NullDeltaListener Taken from the Eclipse Corner article on Tree Viewers
PatternLibContentProvider This provides the content for the Pattern Library tree view.
PatternLibrary  
rationaleElement  
RationaleExplorer The Rationale Explorer is the primary display and access mechanism for the rationale.
RationaleLabelProvider Provides the .gif files that are used to draw the images on the rationale tree.
rationaleNode  
RationaleTaskView This is the class that defines our Rationale Task View.
RationaleTreeMap This is a structure designed to provide an alternative mapping into the RationaleTree.
RationaleUpdateEvent when an event occurs in one view that other views need to know about, fire this is the event that gets fired off.
RationaleUpdateNotifier The notifier is created b the trigger when the rationale update event is created.
RationaleViewContentProvider This provides the content for the RationaleExplorer tree view.
TreeObject This defines a record in the rationale tree.
TreeParent This uses the TreeObjects that describe each node in the tree to form the actual tree.
UpdateType The enumerated class that describes different types of update events.
 

Package edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.views Description

This package sets up the RationaleExplorer and handles operations within it.
